name: Global domain name validator
description: You can validate any domain by using this pattern
content:
www.domain-name.com

www.domain-name.in

www.domain-name.my

*.domain-name.com

www.subdomain.domain-name.com

www.subdomain.domain-name.com.pk

www.subdomain.domain-name.com.any

www.subdomain.domain-name.com.*

subdomain.domain-name.com

domain-name.com

my.domain-name.com

iso.subdomain.domain.com
author: Meer Zohaib
